Name: Signal Support
Description: Gains a random Signal Orb in every 6s.

Name: Attack Boost
Description: Increases the ATK of Attacker Omniframes by 20%

Name: Fortified Armor
Description: Increases the ATK of Tank Omniframes by 20%

Name: Chain Optimization
Description: QTE cooldown decreases by 1s.

Name: Leadership Chain
Description: After summoning a QTE, unleashes a shockwave within 6m that deals 300% Physical DMG.

Name: Physical Boost
Description: Physical DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Reactive Armor
Description: Constructs' Extra DMG Reduction increases by 15%.

Name: Tactical Switch
Description: Every time characters are switched, they get 2 additional Signal Orbs.

Name: Life Recovery
Description: Increases the Healing of Support Omniframes by 25%

Name: Mobility Up
Description: Limit of Dodge Gauge increases by 400.

Name: Damage Reflection
Description: Strikes back at the attacker for 300% of ATK every time after taking more than 300 DMG.

Name: Support Boost
Description: Increases the ATK of Support Omniframes by 40%

Name: Elemental Boost
Description: Elemental DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Attack Boost
Description: Increases the ATK of Attacker Omniframes by 20%

Name: Mechanical Learning
Description: Every successful dodge will reduce the attacker's DEF by 10%. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

Description: Increases the DMG of Support Omniframes by 50%
